notes.text: Mikhail Mendelev (Ames Laboratory) noted that the potential is an updated version of the 2012 potential, and it was designed to simulate solidification of B2, B33, and C16 phases in Ni-Zr alloys. Updated previous note on 13 Nov. 2014 to replace "NiZr2 alloy" with "Ni-Zr alloys". Updated 27 Apr 2015 to include publication information.
